name: Full-Stack Web Development
description: I have built the complete tech stack of multiple corporate-ready, web, and hybrid mobile appsâ€”both individually and by managing a developer team. I prefer an agile approach, allowing better product feedback from a fast release cycle. I am well-versed in multiple front-end and back-end JavaScript frameworks, including a growing expertise with serverless architectures.

name: Software Product Management
description: I have steered several software products from concept, through development and testing to ongoing operations. I enjoy tackling a complex problem, imagining how a solution can be applied, then carefully managing the steps to build it effectively and efficiently.

name: Team Leadership
description: Although my career in small companies has meant managing smaller teams, I have worked hard to develop my skills as a team manager and have successfully remote-managed transnational, multilingual teams. In addition to organizing their development work, I mentored my team and ensured that their skill sets were consistently growing to support our future needs. I have also managed community groups, including organizing our local masters swimming team (100+ members).
